/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the everyday life of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. On the left side of the street, a red crane stands tall, its silhouette contrasting against the clear blue sky. The buildings on the right side of the street are painted in a soothing shade of green, blending harmoniously with the natural surroundings. The image is taken from a low angle, adding depth and perspective to the scene. The overall composition of the image paints a vivid picture of a typical day in Beijing, where nature and urban life coexist in harmony.
